ch.pschatzmann.docker.jobs.api

Class DockerAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.docker.jobs.api.DockerAPI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDocker

    public class DockerAPI
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDocker
    Access to Docker functionality. We have layered all calls to the external interface so that we can exchange the API implementation easily.
    Author:
    pschatzmann

      Constructor and Description
      DockerAPI() 
      DockerAPI(java.lang.String host)
      Setup the connection to Docker using the indicated host
